title: Sebas.tian
author: Sebas.tian
content: I was a graduate, looking for something reasonable to do that will make me a great man in the society. I got a delivery Job were I was receiving $300 per month just to keep myself busy until a bigger job will come. On a faithful day I received a call from my childhood friend in school those days that told me to quit the delivery job i was doing, that the money is too small for me to plan well for my future which I did by resigned from the company. And he introduced me to online business which is Bitcoin investment because he knew that I study business administration in school those days and he thought me everything about Bitcoin investment include buy Bitcoin when the price is low in the market and hold until the price increase higher to my satisfaction before I can sell to make something good from the market. I started developing more interest on Bitcoin investment, because the way he impacted the knowledge to me how someone can become a rich man through Bitcoin investment that made me to do everything possible within my power to aquire the knowledge at the moment. And I started Bitcoin investment in the month of October 2017 when the price of Bitcoin was $6,468, were I invested $10,000 all the money I saved from my delivery job in Bitcoin investment and hold for like 3 years before I released my bitcoins to the market in the month ofÂ  December 2020 during the Christmas period when the price of Bitcoin increased to $23,400 that helped me to achieved massive incomes from my Bitcoin investment that changed my life in the society.HERE'S HOW BITCOIN CHANGED ME AND CAN CHANGED YOU TOO:1) my relationship with people: Try to have a strong relationship with people who can impact positive things in your life that will make your future colorful, like what my school childhood friend did to me that changed my life in the society.2) Opportunity: Try to embrace genuine opportunity that will change your life in future, like what I did to eliminated poverty in my family by embraced Bitcoin investment to quit my delivery job that changed me in the society.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Don't quit your job to invest in bitcoin, it is a very unwise option to take, investing in bitcoin is not a business, neither is it time consuming, so you can keep your other sources of income or your jobs in real life and still comfortably invest in bitcoin.Quote from: Sebas.tian on September 11, 2022, 01:32:45 PM2) Opportunity: Try to embrace genuine opportunity that will change your life in future, like what I did to eliminated poverty in my family by embraced Bitcoin investment to quit my delivery job that changed me in the society.If you say it worked for you, then fine and good for you, but advising people to quit their job and invest in bitcoin is not something i will do, bitcoin is not a quick money scheme, it takes a long time for profits to come, if i quit my job to invest in bitcoin, i would have no means of survival before i take profits in the long term, it is a no-no for me, it should be a no-no for you and everyone else too.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Sebas.tian on September 11, 2022, 01:32:45 PMOn a faithful day I received a call from my childhood friend in school those days that told me to quit the delivery job i was doing, that the money is too small for me to plan well for my future which I did by resigned from the company.I don't see any reason why you quit your job to focus on bitcoin investment which does not require your full time. Still working your regular job while investing in bitcoin can still be very profitable and even so ensure that you do not concern yourself much with the market fluctuations which can aid your decision to hodl. Quote from: Sebas.tian on September 11, 2022, 01:32:45 PM And he introduced me to online business which is Bitcoin investment because he knew that I study business administration in school those days and he thought me everything about Bitcoin investment...I don't think it is proper to refer to bitcoin investment as an online business, plus whatever you studied in school doesn't hold any relevance to bitcoin investment if you do not still learn properly about it. There are people who studied nothing regarding finance , economics or business in school, and they are still doing very well in this space.

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: I love the smell of bullshit on these Bitcointalk threads.In other words, first the OP tells us that he became interested in BTC but not because it is an autonomous and decentralized system that does not depend on central banks etc, but purely because of the profitability. Then it turns out that he invested $10,000 to sell it a few years later for $23,400 and thatQuote from: Sebas.tian on September 11, 2022, 01:32:45 PMthat helped me to achieved massive incomes from my Bitcoin investment that changed my life in the society.Then he would also have to explain what he has invested in again in order to generate an "income" that I don't know if he knows very well what he is saying.Anyway, I can't imagine in which country the difference between having $10,000 and having $23,000 can change your life. If you live in the USA it is little capital and if you live in the Philippines it is more considerable capital but the difference between the investment and the final result does not change your life. And it turns out that supposedly this has changed his way of being, his relationship with society..... It seems to me quite a lot of bullshit that has more to do with expecting to get merit for the story than anything to do with reality.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: I'm happy the op had such a positive experience. However, there are risky and negative things as well. For instance, some people quit jobs and go investing in Bitcoin, ending up losing a lot of money if not even owing others. Moreover, a job is something that certainly gives you money (at least, if you're working officially and in a fairly stable environment where an employer can't just refuse to pay the salary), whereas with investments, you can win and can also lose. Investments should be made more reasonably, when there's still a source of income in case things don't work out.
